main event: A circular, silvery-white object was observed hovering above the trees south of the witness's location in Newport News, Virginia on October 7, 1969.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for about 5 minutes before moving off to the southwest at a high rate of speed.
The object had a bright, white luminosity and seemed to change in size slightly during the observation period.
The object did not make any sound and did not show any abrupt changes in brightness or motion.
The reporting individual described the object as approximately the size of a full moon in the sky.
The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.
